refnamediv.refpurpose: lpeparelm is a filter which removes inert parameters in a linear process equation.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This tools removes parameters, who will have no influence on condition, action or time arguments of an LPE. Removing these parameters form the LPE can lead to a reduction when generating a state space of an LPE.

refsect1.title: File

listitem.para: &lpeparelm; read from &stdin;, and writes an LPE to &stdout;.
&lpeparelm; read from file &infile;, and writes an LPE to &stdout;.
&lpeparelm; read from file &infile;, and writes an LPE to file &outfile;.
&lpeparelm; reads from file &stdin;, and writes an LPE to file &outfile;.

refsect1.para: Note that &lpeparelm; reads and writes in LPE-format.

listitem.para: Displays short intermediate information during the run of the program. If a &outfile; is given, &lpeparelm; writes the LPE to that given file. If no &outfile; is given it will only display process information.

Displays detailed intermediate information during the run of the program. If a &outfile; is given, &lpeparelm; writes the LPE to that given file. If no &outfile; is given it will only display process information.
